name: GNOLL WARRIOR

actions.name: Rend
actions.text: Melee Attack Roll: +4, reach 5 ft. Hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) Piercing damage.

actions.name: Bone Bow
actions.text: Ranged Attack Roll: +3, range 150/600 ft. Hit: 6 (1d10 + 1) Piercing damage.

bonus_actions.name: Rampage (1/Day)
bonus_actions.text: Immediately after dealing damage to a creature that is already Bloodied, the gnoll moves up to half its Speed, and it makes one Rend attack.
